content.description:
A taste of Squamish granite with a beautiful beach setting. This area has a few walls with mostly mixed/trad climbing, but also offers some sweet bouldering. The beach boulder is the only thing in the shade in the afternoon, bring sunscreen! A lot of the routes allow for top ropes to be setup from the top of the cliffs. 
  
 Please note, this information about this crag is a work in progress. Please feel free to add to this page any routes or areas, as I have only been there once and will only be adding the climbs I have tried.
